frontmatter.title: IIT Bombay Summer Internship 2026

frontmatter.experienceRequired: Research exposure helpful; strong fundamentals required
frontmatter.stipend: Expected: faculty-funded positions may offer INR 8,000–15,000/month; many positions are unpaid but provide hostel subsidy
frontmatter.eligibility: B.Tech/B.S/M.Tech/M.S students with strong CGPA and faculty-aligned interests; preference for 3rd/4th year UG
frontmatter.education: B.Tech/B.S/M.Tech/M.S in engineering, sciences, or interdisciplinary programs
frontmatter.author: InternshipsHub Editorial
frontmatter.source: IIT Bombay research internship notices and prior-year academic calendars

frontmatter.description: NIT Srinagar Summer Internship 2026 guide covering domains, dates, selection steps, and application strategy.
frontmatter.experienceRequired: Project evidence or coursework aligned to the chosen lab
frontmatter.stipend: Expected: few sponsored stipends; certificate-only common
frontmatter.eligibility: B.Tech/B.E./Dual/M.Tech/M.S students with good CGPA, lab-aligned projects, and availability in May–July
skills: Programming or simulation in the chosen domain
Data analysis or lab measurement skills
frontmatter.author: InternshipsHub Editorial
frontmatter.source: NIT Srinagar faculty communications and prior cycles

frontmatter.title: Freshworks Product Analyst (Fresher)
frontmatter.description: Join Freshworks' growth team to analyze product usage and ship data-informed experiments for global SMB customers.
frontmatter.experienceRequired: 0-1 years
frontmatter.stipend: Annual package with performance bonus
frontmatter.eligibility: Recent graduates in engineering, analytics, or business with strong quantitative aptitude.
frontmatter.education: B.E/B.Tech/B.Sc in Computer Science, IT, Mathematics, or related
frontmatter.author: InternshipsHub Editorial
frontmatter.source: Freshworks Careers Portal

frontmatter.title: IISc Quantum Computing Research Fellowship
frontmatter.description: Contribute to IISc's Centre for Quantum Technology on error correction and superconducting qubit simulations.
frontmatter.experienceRequired: 0-2 years research experience
frontmatter.stipend: INR 55,000 per month
frontmatter.eligibility: Postgraduate students in Physics, Electrical Engineering, or Computer Science with quantum computing exposure.
frontmatter.education: M.Tech/M.Sc/MS in Physics, Electrical Engineering, or Computer Science
frontmatter.author: InternshipsHub Editorial
frontmatter.source: IISc Centre for Quantum Technology
